add r5.xyz, -r4.xyzx, r0.xyzx

dp3 r0.w, r5.xyzx, r5.xyzx

div r0.w, l(2.000000), r0.w

mul r0.w, r0.w, r3.w

mul r0.w, r0.w, r3.w
dp3 r3.w, r3.xyzx, r0.xyzx
dp3 r3.x, r3.xyzx, r4.xyzx

dp3 r0.y, r4.xyzx, r4.xyzx

mad r0.x, r0.y, r0.z, r0.x
div r0.y, r3.x, r0.y
add_sat r0.y, r3.y, r0.y
div r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
